website_summaries.verdict: Small wall fan that will fit in tight spaces with an oscillating feature.
pros: Only 12 inches in diameter, but tends to run quieter than larger fans
Requires assembly after purchase, but it's an easy process
All-white design of the fan can be easy match to your decor
Runs at three different blade speeds
Can turn the oscillation feature on and off as needed
cons: Costs a little more than other 12-inch wall fans

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had five of these fans running 24/7 with no problems at all for the past 4 years. You won't go wrong with these units.
customer_reviews.author: Zippo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! We mounted in our RV for extra airflow in our bedroom and it’s great! Easy to mount and we keep it up while the RV is in motion. It does come down but holds up extremely well. I have since bought a smaller one to mount in my kids bunk area
customer_reviews.author: M. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Quiet, nice air flow, and looks great on my bedroom wall. A terrific and inexpensive alternative to installing a ceiling fan. The only negative I would like to mention is that I wish there was a separate cord to turn the fan on and off, then I could just leave it on a particular setting instead of having to pull the cord multiple times. CAUTION: In order to tilt the fan up or down, I suggest you remove the small plastic cover on the side of the fan head, loosen the screw, tilt the fan to angle you wish, then tighten the screw and replace the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Punch

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan if you need a wall mount
customer_reviews.text: A nice fan exactly what I was looking for to put inside my enclosed porch. You will have to assemble it, the motor blade and fan guard all come seperate but it was easy. I would give 5 stars but I had to take one off due to the fan having a slight unbalance in the fan blade which makes it shake... Overall a nice product and I hope it lasts as long as my other lasko fans
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as i expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fan for the bedroom because i like a little breeze all night long. This fan is a bit too loud for the bedroom and it also had a clicking sound coming from the motor area when on oscillate. I decided i am going to purchase another fan and use this one out in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these fans for out beach house... It's not big so I figured they would be great tucked up in the corners.. Which that part worked out fine.. We haven't had them long and only use them on weekends and already two of them do not work. I think it's the motor.. These fans were not cheap And I expected to get a few years out of them. I am very disappointed that I wasted my money on a product that was supposed to be good. I would definitely not recommend buying this fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rossano

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Fan
customer_reviews.text: These fans worked well to replace similar fans we had on our covered porch in a coastal region. The previous fans had metal shrouds around the fan blades that had rusted. These new fans have plastic shrouds. They are quiet and operate well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bathroom dry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bathroom to point at my cotton shower curtain to dry it and keep room dry. The cover is super easy to pop right off for cleaning. The blades and cover get dusty and it's easy to use the vacuum with hose and brush attachment to get up there and vacuum them off. If I take a hot bath with it on high, it kinda blows water droplets everywhere, but man does it feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars due to limited tilt. It is meant ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars due to limited tilt. It is meant to hang on a wall and point out from the wall, not down. I have it up high on a wall pointing down on my bed (tropics). I had to remove the plastic piece that limits the tilt, grind it down and reassemble. Not a hard job, but not out of the box ready for my application. Lasko fans last much longer than cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Anspacher

customer_reviews.title: Loud but works really well
customer_reviews.text: The fan runs a bit loud especially when on high but it works really really well and cools down a room significantly. well worth the buy, very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my RV bedroom to move the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my RV bedroom to move the air around and with the wall mount it can be removed off wall to travel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blow much air
customer_reviews.text: I think the cost does not match the quality. I bought another lasko fan that's wall mountable, and it blows way more air than this one. They almost look identical, but this one does not blow very much air.
customer_reviews.author: Rednekgirlgonefishin

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great...just ok.
customer_reviews.text: We just installed it in our son's room (only took 5 minutes!!) and even though we don't mind the humming (we actually enjoy that part), the rattling noises are really annoying! Since it's already installed, we don't plan on returning it but chances are we'll continue to shop around for a better quality fan. Speaking of better quality...I don't believe this fan is worth 50 bucks. Perhaps 38.00 dollars sounds more realistic, based on the quality and rattling noises it makes (and believe me, I tried everything to make it stop rattling and nothing worked). Having said all that, the fan does a good job when it comes to air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Adelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my third lasko fan...I have 2 in my greenhouse,on 365 days a year x 6-8 hrs per day...each fan has lasted >2 yrs...considering the price and length of time of use a bargain( in my humble opinion)...recommended
customer_reviews.author: jjb

customer_reviews.title: Yellowed plastic fan
customer_reviews.text: This was not the product advertised. It is a yellowish plastic fan. I'm very disappointed and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my garage workshop
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. The pull cord works effortlessly to turn on and off while adjusting speeds. It moves a good amount of air and makes a wide sweep.
customer_reviews.author: bladenbullet

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and hi quality, power fuse in the plug is a nice touch for fire safety.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: For the price and for the fact that it was darn hard finding a reasonably-priced wall mount fan that I could mount on an outdoor covered porch, this fan does the job. Although it may not be specifically rated for outdoor use (no sealed motor), it is all plastic and well-priced enough to take a chance doing so---especially in a covered outdoor situation. Too, it both oscillates left to right and adjusts up and down. Try finding another such fan for this price. Worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: rickk

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of them. they both broke and stopped oscillating in 60 days
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for Laundry Room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my laundry room renovation. It was easy to put up on the wall (be sure to connect it to wall studs). Works well, and is easy to dust off each week.
customer_reviews.author: 78run

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans. I have had two in my garage for the past six or seven years. One had to be replace in that time, but that's to be expected. No wobble or vibration. Very quiet and moves a good deal of air. Mounting bracket requires two screws (supplied). Takes five minutes to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Broke after few uses
customer_reviews.text: 4 months since we ordered it. Used it average of 30 min every week since then and it already broke. Wtf. It won't turn on. What’s the need to sell such a crappy product? For customers not to trust the sellers again?
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and easy to lift off the bracket while traveling in our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Como

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my church. It was perfect for the kitchen area where we needed it. I hope it will last through this HOT summer we are having...and then some. It looks great on the wall area where we mounted it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Blount

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of mistakes and materials do not connect together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and it gets super hot sometimes. I have one of these in the kitchen and one in the bedroom, both positioned next to windows to blow in fresh air. I use the one in the kitchen when it gets hot from cooking, the one in the bedroom when it gets hot in the night. I have no complaints about these, I will probably get another for the living room when it gets warmer outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. I just bought another one. It's quiet enough, and creates a nice breeze. I like the string pull. Never had a problem with it. UPDATE: Am returning this fan. It arrived defective; and it does look more cheaply made than the one I bought a year ago elsewhere. I ordered an Air King instead. Hopefully it will work out.
customer_reviews.author: Max Parsons

customer_reviews.title: This fan is light weight and effective, but wow ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is light weight and effective, but wow it's very loud! Lots of irregular clicks in all three settings, and wakes my toddler up. I see others have reviewed it as quiet, so I wonder if ours is just bum. Can't figure out how to contact the seller for replacement or repair suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Seal

customer_reviews.title: a fan of a fan
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, great, love it, use it in bathroom to circulate air after showers
customer_reviews.author: 2020musthave

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good fan but wish there went farther to the right and left than it does. Good air movement and easy installing on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mochamom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent *and* Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this because one reviewer wrote it could not be adjusted in anyway. I was pleased during installation to find a cap that easily popped off to reveal a screw that can be loosened to change the angle of the fan. I needed to mount it high and point the fan down slightly. No problem! I also needed to adjust the range of oscillation from dead center to the left slightly, and found another screw that enabled this kind of adjustment. After loosening it slightly, I moved the fan to the left, heard a ratchet-click, then tightened. Presto! This fan is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great room fan for dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter to use in her college dorm. I was not able to mount it on the dorm wall so I use flex cuffs like the police use to lash to the foot board of her bed. She says it works great. The size, two ways to activate it and multi speeds are just right for a dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fans
customer_reviews.text: These fans are great. We ordered two of them for the covered patio. They are up high enough so they do not get wet. They really keep the air moving. The cord to pull for your speed is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The installation of the fan was ok, but I felt moved to share with people that it is far from quiet. Even at low speeds, there is a considerable amount of noise from the fan vibrating so much. In a noisy space, I don't think it would matter, but in a quiet room, the least I would expect from a fan would be to be reasonably quiet at low speeds.
customer_reviews.author: boognish

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I had 16" versions of this fan at our summer camp. I needed one for a smaller room so I bought this 12" version. It works great too!
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: I previously had a larger one that was noisy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a larger one that was noisy and thought the smaller one would be quieter but it is not. The oscillation is not very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Rosato

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall mount fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan was as described. controls worked fine and as described. Mounting was easy with a winder to hide extra cord. Nice product especially if you don't have a table or a open flat surface to set a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great for a room with no ceiling fan, and dont have to worry about hitting foot on stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Y

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet unit - perfect for hanging in a doorway to direct cold/hot air into a small room
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. My only complaint is that the plastic was yellowed, which really came to my attention when, after installing it, the cleaning lady said she tried to clean it - she thought it was old!!
customer_reviews.author: tMori209

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a while for a wall mount fan and saw this at our Credit Union behind the cashiers...... I purchased it through Amazon and it's PERECT for my home office. Very quiet, three speed and small enough to NOT blow papers around. I don 't understand why they don't sell these in stores???
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cheap, not much power to feel the breeze at all.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Lemon. Both the product and the return policy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 47 days of light off and on use. Coveniently Amazon stops taking returns on this item 30 days after purchase. I guess I can contact the manufacturer and hold my breath. Not sure I'm gonna waste that time though. Next time I'll buy local so I can return the item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aenima

customer_reviews.title: fan ok, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The fan does a decent job and for the price it is not bad, we have three of these fans and they move the air pretty well and don't wobble like others have said. The big problem is with the customer service of lasko. The product came with two front covers and no back cover so I couldn't put it together. The customer service is impossible to reach and when they finally do call you back they don't answer any questions leaving you to call back the next day. If you buy the product and get all the pieces you should, you should be ok but if you have a problem with the fan...good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my shed--there's absolutely no shelf space for another kind of fan, and this circulates the air my freezer and I need.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan does just what I need it to do.. Easy install..
customer_reviews.author: L. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Fan unit worked non-stop for 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was running in my greenhouse for about 3 years continuously then the oscillating mechanism quit working. The fan continued to work fine. I think for the price and the fact that I had it running non-stop it was a good value. Dr. P.
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Fan works great.
customer_reviews.text: Saw bad ratings for this fan, mine works great, no problems. I use it in a bathroom to dry the shower faster. It does exactly what I want t to do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This is just the fan I have been looking for. Compact, oscillating, and adjustable speed. I have another 16" of the same brand and they are very well made and I expect I will have many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P.

customer_reviews.title: Made in America!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan, easy to mount with two provided screws. A quality piece that should last a long time. It's made in America too! Shippimg was fast. I've had a 16 inch pedestal fan in our bedroom for years and this 12inch works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Havanacigar

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan was perfect size for one of my bathrooms.Really moves the air.and looks great and out of the way on wall
customer_reviews.author: Arthur D.

customer_reviews.title: Second fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these wall fans I have ordered, the first for our family room as it gets very hot being open plan with the kitchen. It makes a big difference. After having it a few weeks we decided to get one for our covered patio. We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra LV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great in tight space to cool !
customer_reviews.author: john cotoggio ( son )

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan for a small office
customer_reviews.text: It was the best fan for a small office. Plenty of sppen and good motion. Tilts up and down and has 3 speeds. I am very happy with it and plan to buy anotherone soon. Shipping and handling was great. Was not broken when I got it.....Buy it you'll like it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Noisy Fan
customer_reviews.text: Described as whisper quiet--anything but-- fan rattles & vibrates making much noise. Pull string to change speeds is cheap. Replaced with Homebasics 16" remote wall fan(Same Cost!) and while used very little at this point makes 1/3 to 1/4 the noise. I would not recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Carol Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the corner of my kitchen and it oscillates really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and it mounts very easily
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and it mounts very easily. Perfect for bathroom air circulation. Wish it had more flexability with the up and down feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile I Hannaway

customer_reviews.title: Love my lasco.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to move air and be versital for positioning where you want your fan. If you want to move warm air mount it higher up on the wall. No need to take up floor space or countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in 2012.....still going strong..the setting is always on low.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the camper. Does not take up limited floor space.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Great to hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these on my screened in patio. They are perfect. Very easy to install and 3 speeds provides nice choices. We sit on the patio more now than ever as it makes it cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, moves air, O think its bit too loud
customer_reviews.author: Sasa Bratic

customer_reviews.title: wall mount fan
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, I ordered them to install in my patio, I had already purchased other 3, and all work great. All five of them cover a large area and it works real nice in the Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Albaladejo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to place in unobtrusive areas in my kitchen, instead of large ceiling fans. These are very nice, move a lot of air, and are relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: eeMac

customer_reviews.title: There are complaints, that this fan once installed is ...
customer_reviews.text: There are complaints, that this fan once installed is wobbly. The problem is not the fan itself, but the TOO SHORT mounting screws that come in the box. I installed my fan with some LONGER sheetrock screws or 16 penny nails and it doesn't wobble at all. Blows hard.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wall mounted fans. This is my third room in the basement to mount one in. The ceilings are too low for ceiling fans and these really do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, but I thought it could be adjusted ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fan, but I thought it could be adjusted up or down and it doesn't. Only side to side at angle mounted. I had bought for a guest room and ended up hanging in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Obsessed online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang just follow the instructions. Works great on the wall of my garage to move the air around.
customer_reviews.author: Boodle65

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I had almost forgotten how nice a wall mount fan was. Not table or floor space to give up. I use it Im my shop and it works great. You seldom w find wall mount fans in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: great wall mount fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. It moves a good amount of air. It is not overly loud. It was easy to install. Would recommend. The price was very fair for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is our third fan over 10 Years. For the price they can't be beat. Noise level-Normal
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy fan with lots of rattles!! Doesn't move much air either! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Love the fan but would like it to work by ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan but would like it to work by remote. This is my 2nd one. First one still worked but was used outside and wanted a new clean one.
customer_reviews.author: Diana  Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & efficient
customer_reviews.text: was easy to mount. provides nice coverage with good air movement. unit runs smoothly & doesn't vibrate on wall. would have preferred remote control, but only larger unit comes with remote.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: better than the previous
customer_reviews.text: This fan of wall covering every expectation I was looking to us it in the bathroom, quiet, small and confortable air. Seending too eficient, better than the previous, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nitza Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: but mounts nicely on the wall
customer_reviews.text: made noise by the end of the summer, but mounts nicely on the wall
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: really like this fan
customer_reviews.text: wanted something to circulate the air in my small room without taking up precious floor space this fan has been great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Palmqusit

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, breezy installation. Idiot-proof instructions. Works for both my living room and kitchen as it is mounted in doorwell. Super quiet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: idearz

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan -moves air
customer_reviews.text: I am resonably pleased with this fan. I bought it to circulate heat away from a new pellet stove. It mounted easily and moves a lot of air even on medium or low. It is not whisper quiet. On medium speed you cna hear the noise. I have it mounted in my living room and I don't find the moise to be an issue but some people might.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lasted 6 years with heavy duty usage. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with product. It is a little loud at night though. It's about 15ft away from me and I can hear it. I leave the fan on oscillate to sweep the entire room and it keeps it cool. The fan does adjust up and down but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: We like it... easy to put up but just wish it tilted a little bit more. It stops and won't tilt as much as we would like.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Adamar
customer_reviews.text: The Wall Mount Fan is all I was expecting. It is functional, it is light weight compared with the fan I had before. The only thing that I was not expecting about this fan, is its plastic rear grill, I supposed it was metal but it's fine for me. That explains the light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Adalys Carmona

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It is working excellently works great although I recommend being small is a good buy also is in good price
customer_reviews.author: Queso

customer_reviews.title: What a great fan!
customer_reviews.text: My infant's room was SO hot even with the a/c on, old house. I bought this fan because I could mount it on the wall and he wouldn't lose any fingers! After a few hours I was amazed with how nice his room felt. So happy! It's also very quiet, but has a little noise which he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: this fan worked out great. easy to install. came in as described in the description. thank you for the quick shipment
customer_reviews.author: sara Vo Tran

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The fan works well. It was a bit squeeky shortly after install it. A spot of lubricant and it is again working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Switch Broke
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace the whole fan because the $5.00 switch broke and could not find replacement. But the fan works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hak

customer_reviews.title: Cool breeze
customer_reviews.text: We loved these fans so much we bought two of them. They are used in the bathrooms when the AC is off
customer_reviews.author: Henry T. Doherty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item because it was missing vital parts.  The manufacturer told me to do this.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was missing vital parts. The manufacturer told me to do this. I did not yet re-order it.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. The fan has a very good and sturdy frame. It also has a powerful motor and it was extremely easy to mount on my bathroom wall. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Simoa Alipate

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This fan was just installed and works fine. It appears sturdy and of good quality, but since we just got it, we can't provide a true assessement of durability and longevity. We bought this to put in our small gym area of our basement. I didn't want to cannibalize the limited floor space. Nothing negative to say about the fan except it seems a bit pricey for a fan, if it lasts a long time, then it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie718

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The motor on the fan I purchased spins backwards. The fan pulls, rather than pushes air. I'm surprised how the fan can get through quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan. Perfect for an area without much space. We have had one almost like it before, and the cord deteriorated with use. We hope that will NOT happen with this one. It COULD be a problem, but we like the fan type. It was easy to install, and it fits our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D. Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Wall mount fan
customer_reviews.text: Great option for our room, very quiet and moves a lot of air. Very happy with this fan, and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: This fan does not last
customer_reviews.text: We use the fan to move air in a small aquaponics greenhouse and it quit after only five months. It also vibrates to the point it probably helped our tomato plants to pollinate themselves. Buy better quality or a floor fan instead.
customer_reviews.author: Notvested

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect garage fan for me. Easy to install. The cord is the key.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lynch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these fans. One stopped working within the week.
customer_reviews.author: matt sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Lasko 3-Speed 12" Oscillating Wall-Mount Fan
customer_reviews.text: The Lasko 3-Speed 12" Wall-Mount Fan is the Fan I have looked for a long time. The oscillating fan is very quiet, easy to install, and the right one for a large bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Koch

customer_reviews.title: poor quality fan
customer_reviews.text: this wall fan shakes and vibrates continually even though it is securily fastened to the wall. it appears that the problem is the non-rigid fan cage. we would NOT recommend this fan to anyone. hopefully amazon will replace this product with a quality fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ginna Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Needed replacement
customer_reviews.text: Fan had to be replaced as it made grinding noise as it oscillated left and right, the last few degrees. Otherwise it is a nice fan.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Berry

product_meta.title: Lasko 3012 12-Inch Wall Fan
product_meta.description:
Color:White 3012 12Lasko's 12-inch oscillating wallmount fan features quiet three speed operation and durable, quality construction. Grill won't rust or corrode. Offers 90-degree oscillation or directional cooling. Made in the USA from Domestic and Imported Parts. Lasko; 100+ years of quality, comfort and durability.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Three speed motors, 3 way oscillation, zinc plated safety grilles, pull cord speed control, adjustable vertical tilt, three prong grounded cordset. 120 AC, 60 Hz.
feature_bullets: Ideal for places where table space is limited
